title: Wapinter

content: Translators for the following languages are needed urgently. Afrikaans (Taken) Albanian (Reserved) Amharic (Reserved) Arabic (Reserved) Armenian (Reserved) Bengali (Taken) Bosnian (Reserved) ChewaChinese simplified mandarin (Reserved) Chinese Traditional (Reserved) Croatian (Reserved) Danish (Reserved) Dutch (Reserved) Estonian (Reserved) Filipino (Reserved) French (Reserved) Georgian (Reserved) German (Reserved) Greek (Reserved) Gujarati (Reserved) Hindi (Reserved) Hungarian (Reserved) Indonesian (Reserved) Italian (Taken) Japanese (Reserved) KinyarwandaKurdish (Reserved) Malagasy (Reserved) Malaysian (Reserved) Norwegian (Reserved) Oromo (Reserved) Pashto (Reserved) Polish (Reserved) Portuguese (Reserved) PunjabiRomanian (Reserved) Russian (Reserved) Sepedi (Sesotho)Setswana/TswanaShonaSomalian (Reserved) Spanish (Reserved) Swahili (Reserved) Swedish (Reserved) Tamil (Reserved) ThaiTigrinya(Reserved) Turkish (Reserved) Ukrainian (Reserved) Urdu (Reserved) Vietnamese (Reserved) TeluguKorean (Reserved) Hebrew (Reserved) Marathi (Reserved) Xhoza (Reserved) Zulu (Reserved) Bulgarian (Reserved) Lithuanian (Reserved) KichwaPm me on telegram @wapinter for details

comments.body: I had a list of our translators, but couldn't update it from the last few months, but you can still check with them through btctalk if they still work. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5222178.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5222178.msg54243798#msg54243798

comments.author: Porfirii
comments.body: Quote from: irfan_pak10 on August 13, 2022, 09:55:30 PMI had a list of our translators, but couldn't update it from the last few months, but you can still check with them through btctalk if they still work. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5222178.0https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5222178.msg54243798#msg54243798A few members asked to join months ago. Please irfan_pak10, update the list when you have time.Btw, glad to see you Wapinter. I see that Spanish is already reserved, but just in case I'd like to remind readers that I am available for these works if anybody needs a native Spanish translator.
